## Webhook ‡∏Ñ‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏≠‡∏∞‡πÑ‡∏£?

‡∏•‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤ webhook ‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏°‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏á‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ï‡∏π‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡πÅ‡∏≠‡∏õ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì ‡∏ó‡∏∏‡∏Å‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏•‡∏π‡∏Å‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏´‡∏≤ Droid ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì DealDroid ‡∏à‡∏∞‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏Ç‡∏≠ `POST` ‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏¢‡∏±‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ã‡∏¥‡∏£‡πå‡∏ü‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì‡∏ó‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏≠‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏î‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏´‡∏°‡∏î

**‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏ì‡∏µ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏±‡πà‡∏ß‡πÑ‡∏õ:**

- üìä **‡∏ß‡∏¥‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏∞‡∏´‡πå‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏ï‡∏≤‡∏°** ‚Äî ‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏ó‡∏∏‡∏Å‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏™‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏ô‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ß‡∏¥‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏∞‡∏´‡πå
- üîî **‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏à‡πâ‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ï‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î‡πÄ‡∏≠‡∏á** ‚Äî ‡πÅ‡∏à‡πâ‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ï‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡∏°‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì‡∏ú‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô Slack, Discord ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏≠‡∏µ‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏•
- üíæ **‡πÄ‡∏ä‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ê‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•** ‚Äî ‡πÄ‡∏Å‡πá‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏ê‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì‡πÄ‡∏≠‡∏á
- ü§ñ **‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏ï‡πÇ‡∏ô‡∏°‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏ö‡∏∏‡∏Ñ‡∏Ñ‡∏•‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏°** ‚Äî ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏Å‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏£‡πå‡∏Å‡πÇ‡∏ü‡∏•‡∏ß‡πå‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏°‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á Zapier ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠ Make
- üîç **‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì‡∏†‡∏≤‡∏û** ‚Äî ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á AI ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏•‡πÑ‡∏ó‡∏°‡πå

## ‡∏Ç‡∏±‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà 1: ‡∏ï‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤ Webhook ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì

![Webhook configuration in automation panel](@/assets/third-party/webhook.jpg)

‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà **Automation Panel** ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏î‡∏ä‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡∏î DealDroid ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏ï‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏™‡πà‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏Ñ‡∏±‡∏ç:

### 1. Webhook URL

‡∏ô‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Ñ‡∏∑‡∏≠ URL ‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏ò‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ì‡∏∞‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á endpoint ‡πÄ‡∏ã‡∏¥‡∏£‡πå‡∏ü‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏à‡∏∞‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏Ç‡∏≠ `POST` ‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å webhook

**‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á:** `https://your-server.com/webhook`

**‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î:**

- ‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ñ‡∏∂‡∏á‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏ò‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ì‡∏∞ (DealDroid ‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ñ‡∏∂‡∏á‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ)
- ‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ HTTPS (‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏†‡∏±‡∏¢)
- ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏£‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏î‡πÄ‡∏£‡πá‡∏ß (‡∏†‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏ô 5 ‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ)

### 2. Verify Token

‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á token ‡∏¢‡∏∑‡∏ô‡∏¢‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏ï‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏ã‡πâ‡∏≥‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏Ç‡∏≠ webhook DealDroid ‡∏à‡∏∞‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏° token ‡∏ô‡∏µ‡πâ‡πÑ‡∏ß‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∏‡∏Å‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏Ç‡∏≠ webhook ‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ß‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏ó DealDroid ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì‡∏à‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏á‡πÜ

**‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á:** `your_verify_token_here_2024`

**‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏õ‡∏è‡∏¥‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏î‡∏µ:**

- ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏™‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏™‡∏∏‡πà‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏≤‡∏ß (‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏¢ 32 ‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏Å‡∏©‡∏£)
- ‡πÄ‡∏Å‡πá‡∏ö‡πÑ‡∏ß‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏†‡∏±‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô environment variable
- ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤ commit ‡∏•‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏ô version control
- ‡∏´‡∏°‡∏∏‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏¢‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏†‡∏±‡∏¢

## ‡∏Ç‡∏±‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà 2: ‡∏ó‡∏≥‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡πÉ‡∏à‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏Ç‡∏≠ Webhook

‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏µ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏° DealDroid ‡∏à‡∏∞‡∏ó‡∏≥‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏Ç‡∏≠ `POST` ‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏¢‡∏±‡∏á webhook URL ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏° verify token ‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ö‡∏°‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô query parameter

### ‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö URL ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏Ç‡∏≠

```
https://your-server.com/webhook?verify_token=your_verify_token_here_2024
```

**‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏Ñ‡∏±‡∏ç:** ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö query parameter `verify_token` ‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ö token ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì‡∏ï‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡πÑ‡∏ß‡πâ‡πÄ‡∏™‡∏°‡∏≠‡∏Å‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏°‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏Ç‡∏≠ ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ‡πÅ‡∏ô‡πà‡πÉ‡∏à‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤ webhook ‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏ó DealDroid ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì‡∏à‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏á‡πÜ

---

## ‡∏Ç‡∏±‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà 3: ‡∏ó‡∏≥‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡πÉ‡∏à Request Body

‡∏ó‡∏∏‡∏Å‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏Ç‡∏≠ webhook ‡∏à‡∏∞‡∏°‡∏µ JSON payload ‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏•‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏≠‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏î‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏ß‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°

### TypeScript Type Definition

```typescript
type MessageForwarding = {
  // Reference IDs
  mid: string;
  chatId: number;
  customerId: number;
  droidId: number;
  channelId: number;

  // Message Content
  type: "human" | "ai" | "system" | "log" | "admin";
  content: {
    type: "text" | "image" | "button" | "carousel";
    value: string | string[];
    alt?: string;
  };

  // Metadata
  note?: string;
  createdAt: string; // ISO 8601 timestamp
};
```

### ‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á Webhook Payload

```json
{
  "mid": "ddtp-ckz9abc123xyz",
  "chatId": 12345,
  "customerId": 67890,
  "droidId": 11122,
  "channelId": 33445,
  "type": "human",
  "content": {
    "type": "text",
    "value": "Hello, I have a question about your products!"
  },
  "note": "",
  "createdAt": "2025-08-04T12:30:00.000Z"
}
```

## ‡∏Ñ‡∏π‡πà‡∏°‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏≠‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏≠‡∏¥‡∏á Field

### Reference IDs

| Field        | Type   | ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏≠‡∏ò‡∏¥‡∏ö‡∏≤‡∏¢                                                    |
| ------------ | ------ | ----------------------------------------------------------- |
| `mid`        | string | ‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏∏‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏ã‡πâ‡∏≥‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ô‡∏µ‡πâ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏â‡∏û‡∏≤‡∏∞                 |
| `chatId`     | number | ID ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏ã‡πâ‡∏≥‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡πÄ‡∏ò‡∏£‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏™‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏ô‡∏≤                           |
| `customerId` | number | ID ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏ã‡πâ‡∏≥‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏á                          |
| `droidId`    | number | ID ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏ã‡πâ‡∏≥‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏ó‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì                              |
| `channelId`  | number | ID ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏ã‡πâ‡∏≥‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏ä‡πà‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏™‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏£ (Facebook, LINE ‡∏Ø‡∏•‡∏Ø) |

### Message Type

‡∏ü‡∏¥‡∏•‡∏î‡πå `type` ‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÉ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏ú‡∏π‡πâ‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°:

| Value    | ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏≠‡∏ò‡∏¥‡∏ö‡∏≤‡∏¢                         |
| -------- | -------------------------------- |
| `human`  | ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏π‡∏Å‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏≤                 |
| `ai`     | ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏ó DealDroid ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì   |
| `system` | ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏à‡πâ‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ï‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏ï‡∏∏‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ì‡πå‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏ö |
| `log`    | ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏° log ‡∏†‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏ô                |
| `admin`  | ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏à‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏´‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà/‡πÅ‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏°‡∏¥‡∏ô     |

### Content Object

‡∏≠‡∏≠‡∏ö‡πÄ‡∏à‡πá‡∏Å‡∏ï‡πå `content` ‡∏°‡∏µ payload ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏à‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏á:

| Field   | Type               | ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏≠‡∏ò‡∏¥‡∏ö‡∏≤‡∏¢                        |
| ------- | ------------------ | ------------------------------- |
| `type`  | string             | ‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ô‡∏∑‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏´‡∏≤‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°         |
| `value` | string or string[] | ‡πÄ‡∏ô‡∏∑‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏´‡∏≤‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏≠‡∏á               |
| `alt`   | string (optional)  | ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ñ‡∏∂‡∏á |

### Content Types

| Type       | Value Format     | ‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á                          |
| ---------- | ---------------- | --------------------------------- |
| `text`     | string           | `"Hello, I have a question"`      |
| `image`    | string (URL)     | `"https://example.com/image.jpg"` |
| `button`   | string[] (array) | `["Apple", "Orange", "Banana"]`   |
| `carousel` | string           | `"Send carousel to user"`         |

### Metadata

| Field       | Type              | ‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏≠‡∏ò‡∏¥‡∏ö‡∏≤‡∏¢                                  |
| ----------- | ----------------- | ----------------------------------------- |
| `note`      | string (optional) | ‡∏´‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏ï‡∏∏‡πÉ‡∏î‡πÜ ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏Å‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏ß‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°       |
| `createdAt` | string            | ISO 8601 timestamp ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏° |

---

## ‡∏Ç‡∏±‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà 4: ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Webhook Endpoint ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì

‡∏ñ‡∏∂‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á endpoint ‡πÄ‡∏ã‡∏¥‡∏£‡πå‡∏ü‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏°‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏ú‡∏• webhook ‡∏ô‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Ñ‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏™‡∏°‡∏ö‡∏π‡∏£‡∏ì‡πå‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ Node.js ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ Express

### ‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á Node.js + Express ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏™‡∏°‡∏ö‡∏π‡∏£‡∏ì‡πå

```javascript
import express from "express";

const app = express();
const PORT = process.env.PORT || 3000;

// Store your verify token securely as an environment variable
const VERIFY_TOKEN = process.env.VERIFY_TOKEN || "your_verify_token_here";

// Middleware to verify the token
const verifyToken = (req, res, next) => {
  const providedToken = req.query.verify_token;

  if (providedToken !== VERIFY_TOKEN) {
    console.warn("Unauthorized webhook attempt with invalid verify token");
    return res.status(403).send("Forbidden: Invalid verify token.");
  }

  next();
};

// Middleware to parse JSON bodies
app.use(express.json());

// Define the webhook endpoint
app.post("/webhook", verifyToken, (req, res) => {
  const message = req.body;

  console.log("‚úÖ Webhook received successfully");
  console.log("Message ID:", message.mid);
  console.log("Message Type:", message.type);
  console.log("Content:", message.content);
  console.log("Created At:", message.createdAt);

  // Add your custom logic here
  processMessage(message);

  // Always respond quickly to avoid timeouts
  res.status(200).send("Webhook processed.");
});

// Your custom processing logic
function processMessage(message) {
  // Example: Only process messages from humans
  if (message.type === "human") {
    console.log(
      `Customer ${message.customerId} said: ${message.content.value}`
    );

    // Add your custom logic:
    // - Save to database
    // - Send notification to Slack
    // - Trigger analytics event
    // - Call external API
  }
}

// Start the server
app.listen(PORT, () => {
  console.log(`üöÄ Webhook server is running on port ${PORT}`);
  console.log(
    `üì° Ready to receive webhooks at http://localhost:${PORT}/webhook`
  );
});
```

### ‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ò‡∏µ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏≥‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô

1. **‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏†‡∏±‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏õ‡πá‡∏ô‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏î‡∏±‡∏ö‡πÅ‡∏£‡∏Å**: middleware `verifyToken` ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö query parameter `verify_token` ‡∏Å‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏°‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡πÉ‡∏î‡πÜ
2. **‡πÅ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏á JSON**: Express ‡πÅ‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏á JSON body ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏ï‡πÇ‡∏ô‡∏°‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏¥
3. **‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏°‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°**: ‡∏ü‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡πå‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏ô `processMessage` ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î‡πÄ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì‡∏à‡∏±‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£ webhook payload
4. **‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏î‡πÄ‡∏£‡πá‡∏ß**: ‡πÄ‡∏ã‡∏¥‡∏£‡πå‡∏ü‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ `200 OK` ‡∏ó‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏¢‡∏∑‡∏ô‡∏¢‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö

---

## ‡∏Ç‡∏±‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà 5: ‡∏ó‡∏î‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö Webhook ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì

### ‡∏ó‡∏î‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ ngrok

‡∏´‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏•‡∏±‡∏á‡∏û‡∏±‡∏í‡∏ô‡∏≤‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏á ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ [ngrok](https://ngrok.com/) ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡πÄ‡∏õ‡∏¥‡∏î‡πÄ‡∏ú‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏ã‡∏¥‡∏£‡πå‡∏ü‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì‡∏™‡∏π‡πà‡∏≠‡∏¥‡∏ô‡πÄ‡∏ó‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡πÄ‡∏ô‡πá‡∏ï:

```bash
# Install ngrok (if not already installed)
brew install ngrok

# Start your local server
node server.js

# In another terminal, expose it
ngrok http 3000
```

**ngrok ‡∏à‡∏∞‡πÉ‡∏´‡πâ URL ‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏ò‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ì‡∏∞‡πÄ‡∏ä‡πà‡∏ô:**

```
https://abc123def.ngrok.io
```

‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ URL ‡∏ô‡∏µ‡πâ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ï‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤ webhook ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á DealDroid:

```
https://abc123def.ngrok.io/webhook
```

### ‡∏ó‡∏î‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏à‡∏£‡∏¥‡∏á

1. ‡∏ï‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤ webhook URL ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ secret ‡πÉ‡∏ô DealDroid
2. ‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ó‡∏î‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡πÑ‡∏õ‡∏¢‡∏±‡∏á Droid ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì‡∏ú‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô Facebook, LINE ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÅ‡∏ä‡∏ó‡πÄ‡∏ß‡πá‡∏ö‡πÑ‡∏ã‡∏ï‡πå‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì
3. ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö log ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ã‡∏¥‡∏£‡πå‡∏ü‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏¢‡∏∑‡∏ô‡∏¢‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö webhook ‡πÅ‡∏•‡πâ‡∏ß
4. ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡∏ñ‡∏π‡∏Å‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á

**‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏•‡∏±‡∏û‡∏ò‡πå log ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏Ñ‡∏≤‡∏î‡∏´‡∏ß‡∏±‡∏á:**

```
‚úÖ Webhook received successfully
Message ID: ddtp-ckz9abc123xyz
Message Type: human
Content: { type: 'text', value: 'Hello!' }
Created At: 2025-08-04T12:30:00.000Z
```

## ‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏ä‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ó‡∏±‡πà‡∏ß‡πÑ‡∏õ

### ‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏•‡∏á‡∏ê‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏• (MongoDB)

```javascript
import mongoose from "mongoose";

const MessageSchema = new mongoose.Schema({
  mid: String,
  chatId: Number,
  customerId: Number,
  type: String,
  content: Object,
  createdAt: Date,
});

const Message = mongoose.model("Message", MessageSchema);

async function processMessage(message) {
  try {
    await Message.create(message);
    console.log("üíæ Message saved to database");
  } catch (error) {
    console.error("‚ùå Error saving message:", error);
  }
}
```

### ‡∏™‡πà‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏à‡πâ‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ï‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏ô Slack

```javascript
import axios from "axios";

const SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL = process.env.SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL;

async function processMessage(message) {
  if (message.type === "human") {
    await axios.post(SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL, {
      text: `üó®Ô∏è New customer message: "${message.content.value}"`,
    });
  }
}
```

### ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏Å‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏à‡πâ‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ï‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏≠‡∏µ‡πÄ‡∏°‡∏•

```javascript
import nodemailer from "nodemailer";

const transporter = nodemailer.createTransport({
  service: "gmail",
  auth: {
    user: process.env.EMAIL_USER,
    pass: process.env.EMAIL_PASS,
  },
});

async function processMessage(message) {
  if (message.type === "human") {
    await transporter.sendMail({
      from: "bot@yourcompany.com",
      to: "team@yourcompany.com",
      subject: "New Customer Message",
      text: `Customer ${message.customerId} said: ${message.content.value}`,
    });
  }
}
```

## ‡πÅ‡∏ô‡∏ß‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏õ‡∏è‡∏¥‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏î‡∏µ

### ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏õ‡∏•‡∏≠‡∏î‡∏†‡∏±‡∏¢

- ‚úÖ **‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö verify token ‡πÄ‡∏™‡∏°‡∏≠** ‡∏Å‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏°‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏Ç‡∏≠
- ‚úÖ ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ HTTPS ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö webhook URL ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì
- ‚úÖ ‡πÄ‡∏Å‡πá‡∏ö token ‡πÉ‡∏ô environment variables ‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πà‡πÉ‡∏ô‡πÇ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏î
- ‚úÖ ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ rate limiting ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏õ‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ú‡∏¥‡∏î
- ‚úÖ ‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∂‡∏Å log ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏û‡∏¢‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏¢‡∏∑‡∏ô‡∏¢‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏ï‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏•‡πâ‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏ß

### ‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏™‡∏¥‡∏ó‡∏ò‡∏¥‡∏†‡∏≤‡∏û

- ‚ö° **‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏î‡πÄ‡∏£‡πá‡∏ß** ‚Äî ‡∏¢‡∏∑‡∏ô‡∏¢‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏†‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏ô 5 ‡∏ß‡∏¥‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ
- ‚ö° ‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏°‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏±‡∏Å‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö asynchronous (‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ queue)
- ‚ö° ‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏Å API ‡∏†‡∏≤‡∏¢‡∏ô‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏Å‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏•‡∏±‡∏ö
- ‚ö° ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏à‡∏±‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏ú‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏û‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏î‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏∞‡∏™‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏õ‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏•‡πà‡∏°

### ‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏ô‡πà‡∏≤‡πÄ‡∏ä‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ñ‡∏∑‡∏≠

- üîÑ **‡∏à‡∏±‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏•‡πâ‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏∞‡∏™‡∏°** ‚Äî ‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∂‡∏Å log ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏ú‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏û‡∏•‡∏≤‡∏î‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏î‡∏≥‡πÄ‡∏ô‡∏¥‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ï‡πà‡∏≠
- üîÑ ‡πÄ‡∏Å‡πá‡∏ö webhook ‡πÉ‡∏ô queue ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö retry logic
- üîÑ ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö uptime ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á endpoint ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì
- üîÑ ‡∏ï‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡πà‡∏≤‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏à‡πâ‡∏á‡πÄ‡∏ï‡∏∑‡∏≠‡∏ô‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏•‡πâ‡∏°‡πÄ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏ß‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á webhook

### ‡∏ï‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏¢‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á: ‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏°‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏ú‡∏•‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö Async

```javascript
import Queue from "bull";

const webhookQueue = new Queue("webhooks");

// Webhook endpoint - responds immediately
app.post("/webhook", verifyToken, async (req, res) => {
  // Add to queue for async processing
  await webhookQueue.add(req.body);

  // Respond immediately
  res.status(200).send("Webhook queued.");
});

// Process webhooks asynchronously
webhookQueue.process(async (job) => {
  const message = job.data;

  // Do heavy processing here
  await saveToDatabase(message);
  await sendNotifications(message);
  await updateAnalytics(message);
});
```

---

## ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÅ‡∏Å‡πâ‡∏õ‡∏±‡∏ç‡∏´‡∏≤

### Webhook ‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Ñ‡∏≥‡∏Ç‡∏≠

**‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö:**

- ‚úÖ ‡πÄ‡∏ã‡∏¥‡∏£‡πå‡∏ü‡πÄ‡∏ß‡∏≠‡∏£‡πå‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ñ‡∏∂‡∏á‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏™‡∏≤‡∏ò‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ì‡∏∞‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà?
- ‚úÖ URL ‡∏Ç‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ HTTPS ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà?
